<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nocturnal Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=1611) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 110 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=135) or precise or imprecise [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) and [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416)

</column>

---

Your senses gain even greater clarity. While raging, you gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) if you don't already have it, and the range of your imprecise scent increases to 60 feet.
